title: Joining champ select
body:
So I left champ select cuz I didn't get my lane, not gonna start the first game as a role I don't often play. I join champ select after queue timer runs out and call my role etc. I go to select a champion and the screen goes dim and I can't click anywhere. I haven't selected a champ so I'm taken out of select.

Then I get to wait 15minutes to play
How fun

Edit: after waiting those 15mins I picked my champ and screen only goes black after I select summoner spell, someone left that champ select so my screen is dim and I'm in queue, match found comes up and I'm able to click accept so I do, found out I still can't click a champ and got removed from select so waiting another 15mins just to play 1 game, been an hour waiting now since new update 

Will I get my hour back or na rito?

replies.body:
Hey there,

The issue you're experiencing has been acknowledged by Riot and they're working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells) thread for more information and for how YOU can help speed up the fix.
